step_feedback.feedback: Great job stretching your arm overhead! Keep that arm straight and feel the stretch.
Excellent! You're making a good fist and tightening your muscles as you inhale.
Well done opening your hand and relaxing as you exhale. Keep visualizing that fluid movement.
Fantastic! You're consistently opening your hand wide and relaxing your muscles. Keep up the great work!

exercise_summary: You did a great job with the overhead pumping exercise! Remember to keep your arm straight overhead and focus on making a tight fist while inhaling, then opening your hand wide while exhaling. This helps move fluid effectively.
